title: Specialized athletes debut 1989 RockCombo gravel bike themed Diverge at Unbound
content:
Everything old is new again. That phrase seems to ring true in many facets of life, including the bicycle industry. Many of the most successful modern ideas have been attempted before – to varying degrees of success. The idea of a gravel specific bike is one of those concepts. For Specialized, that came in the […]

The post Specialized athletes debut 1989 RockCombo gravel bike themed Diverge at Unbound appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
